notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsomega.9b02727.
Compilation of PXRD patterns of products from various reaction mixtures after dwelling in a DSC/TG apparatus in Ar atmosphere (Figures S1–S8); summary of synthesis results using micron-Si and amorphous boron as starting materials (Figure S9); PXRD patterns of β-SiB 3 samples (Figure S10); thermal stability investigation of α-SiB 3– x and β-SiB 3 (Figure S11); synthesis of α-SiB 3– x by spark plasma sintering (Figure S12); scanning electron microscopy (SEM) investigation and EDX analysis of cross section polished Si–B reaction pellets (Figures S13 and S14); SEM investigations and EDX analysis of α-SiB 3– x single-crystal specimens (Figure S15); SEM/PXRD analysis of starting materials (Figures S16–S19); probability density isosurface for α-SiB 3– x , model 4 (Figure S20); anharmonic ADP values for Si d and B e (Tables S1 and S2); cross-validation plot of cluster expansion (CE) for α-SiB 3– x (Figure S21); comparison of DFT calculated formation energies with predicted ones using the CE method (Figure S22); vibrational entropy vs T for α-SiB 2.5 (Figure S23); and structure parameters and interatomic distances of DFT optimized α-SiB 2.5, α-SiB 3, β-SiB 3 (Tables S3–S6) ( PDF)
